metilda.services package

Submodules

metilda.services.audio_analysis module

Contains utilities for audio analysis. Some of the visualization functions are based on examples from the parselmouth-praat library: https://github.com/YannickJadoul/Parselmouth

metilda.services.audio_analysis.audio_analysis_image(upload_path, tmin=-1, tmax=-1, min_pitch=75, max_pitch=500, output_path=None)[source]
